title: Creator of Europe on One Pair of Underwear Launches Kickstarter Campaign
text:
Europe on One Pair of Underwear is an exciting board game created by ABNormal Games. Participants have a chance to race through Western Europe while learning about geography and to challenge friends to complete six destinations first to win the game. Now, the creator has launched a to raise funds to produce the board game.
Each player takes turns moving around the board and drawing Travel Cards that are color-coded to various regions and numbers of spaces. "Boat" cards allow travel on ferry routes. A coin flip decides which players get Guide Books, which convey the ability to travel a free space, as well as who will have a clean pair of underwear or will have to watch their underwear, causing them to miss a turn. Each game box includes a game board, 54 destination cards, 54 travel cards, 5 underwear coins, 5 guidebooks, 5 player pieces, 5 travel buddy pieces and a rule book. Each player has a chance to use both skill and luck to beat the other players to the goal of collecting all the travel experiences and crossing Western Europe on a single pair of clean underwear.
As seen at https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1293755680/europe-on-one-pair-of-underwear , the offers several levels of pledges and prizes, including: $1 or more with a personal thanks; $34 or more with a copy of the game; and $150 or more with a copy of the game plus naming rights for one of the five Guidebooks. For more information or to pledge, see the Kickstarter page.
About Europe on One Pair of Underwear:
Europe on One Pair of Underwear is a board game that offers players a chance to have fun while learning the geography of Western Europe . Now, the creator has launched a to raise funds for the production and distribution of this board game.
